slots.best_time0: The best times to visit Beijing are from March to May and from September to October.
slots.best_time1: For the warmest temperatures, October and April are the best times to visit Paris sans crowds.
slots.best_time2: June-September is the best time to visit Ankara.
slots.climate0: In Beijing, there is a continental climate, with cold, sunny winters and hot, sultry, and rainy summers.
slots.climate1: The climate in Paris is continental and therefore mild.
slots.climate2: The climate is warm and temperate in Ankara.
slots.description0: It's China's most significant attraction and can trace its origins back to the Yuan Dynasty of the 13th century.
slots.description1: It is the home of some of the best-known works of art, including the Mona Lisa and the Venus de Milo.
slots.description2: It's the only place in the country where you can grasp the full scope of Anatolia's pre-Classical-era human history.
slots.sight0: The Palace Museum and the Forbidden City
